title: Rendering arb for member_action
body:
There is a bug, only in master (after the commit which transfer some code to arbre gem).

When I do:

```
member_action :some_action do

end
```

And create  (even empty) .some_action.html.arb

It raises

```
undefined local variable or method `current_dom_context' for #<ActiveAdmin::Views::Pages::Layout:0x00000101e5f0b8>
```

with stacktrace: 

```
arbre (1.0.0) lib/arbre/element.rb:177:in `method_missing'
/Users/rodzyn/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p194@nibble/bundler/gems/active_admin-e004fdd8fc94/lib/active_admin/views/pages/layout.rb:17:in `main_content'
/Users/rodzyn/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p194@nibble/bundler/gems/active_admin-e004fdd8fc94/lib/active_admin/views/pages/base.rb:78:in `block (2 levels) in build_main_content_wrapper'
arbre (1.0.0) lib/arbre/element/builder_methods.rb:31:in `block in build_tag'
arbre (1.0.0) lib/arbre/context.rb:92:in `with_current_arbre_element'
arbre (1.0.0) lib/arbre/element/builder_methods.rb:49:in `with_current_arbre_element'
arbre (1.0.0) lib/arbre/element/builder_methods.rb:26:in `build_tag'
arbre (1.0.0) lib/arbre/element/builder_methods.rb:39:in `insert_tag'
arbre (1.0.0) lib/arbre/element/builder_methods.rb:18:in `div'
/Users/rodzyn/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p194@nibble/bundler/gems/active_admin-e004fdd8fc94/lib/active_admin/views/pages/base.rb:77:in `block in build_main_content_wrapper'
arbre (1.0.0) lib/arbre/element/builder_methods.rb:31:in `block in build_tag'
arbre (1.0.0) lib/arbre/context.rb:92:in `with_current_arbre_element'
arbre (1.0.0) lib/arbre/element/builder_methods.rb:49:in `with_current_arbre_element'
arbre (1.0.0) lib/arbre/element/builder_methods.rb:26:in `build_tag'
arbre (1.0.0) lib/arbre/element/builder_methods.rb:39:in `insert_tag'
arbre (1.0.0) lib/arbre/element/builder_methods.rb:18:in `div'

...

```
